product_analysis.dress_characteristics: Sage/mint green silk dress with scattered crystal embellishments, fitted silhouette, spaghetti straps, floor-length elegant design
product_analysis.key_colors_extracted: Muted sage green, silver crystal accents, warm neutral background
product_analysis.luxury_markers: Crystal embellishments, silk texture, elegant draping, timeless silhouette

content_structure.heading: Find Your Perfect Fit
sections: Fit description (true to size/runs small/runs large)
content_structure.styling: Interactive table with hover states, mobile-optimized columns

content_structure.heading: Fast & Secure Delivery
content_structure.styling: Clean list with checkmark icons, accent color for 'Free' text

content_structure.heading: Hassle-Free Returns
content_structure.styling: Reassuring tone, success color for key benefits

content_structure.heading: Keep It Beautiful
sections: Iron on low heat inside out

hero_section.price_position: Overlay on bottom third of hero, semi-transparent background

touch_targets.thumb_zone: Bottom 50-75% of screen for primary actions

image_gallery.indicator_dots: Bottom center, 8px circles, primary color for active

performance.preload: Hero image and first product image

harrods_strengths: Muted luxury color palette (blacks, grays, golds)
Serif + sans-serif typography combination creates hierarchy
Accessible focus states and WCAG compliance
adaptations_for_gen_z: More vibrant but still muted color palette (sage green vs. Harrods darker greens)
Faster, more dynamic interactions (Harrods is more static)
Stronger emphasis on social proof and UGC (testimonials)
Mobile-first with thumb-zone optimization (Harrods is desktop-first)
More playful icon design (organic, imperfect vs. Harrods precision)
Sticky CTA bar for conversion (missing on Harrods)
Shorter, more scannable copy (Gen Z attention span)

aesthetic_principles: Clean minimal but not sterile - warmth through color and typography
Social media native - designed for screenshots and sharing
Authentic over perfect - hand-drawn icons, organic shapes
Fast and friction-free - one-tap actions, pre-filled forms
Values-driven - sustainability messaging, ethical production mentions
conversion_optimizations: One-click checkout options (Shop Pay, Apple Pay)

implemented_techniques: Varied stroke weights (1.6 to 2.2 instead of uniform 2.0)
Organic curves using irregular bezier points
Rounded line caps for friendlier appearance
Coordinates use decimals (.1, .3, .7) not whole numbers

critical_path: Load hero image immediately (preload in HTML head)
Inline critical CSS for above-fold content
Lazy load accordion content until clicked
Use system fonts as fallback while web fonts load
accessibility_requirements: All interactive elements must have focus states
Accordion sections use proper ARIA attributes
Color contrast meets WCAG AA minimum (4.5:1 for text)

brand_voice.tone: Sophisticated but approachable, confident but not intimidating
brand_voice.language: Modern and concise, avoiding overly formal or technical terms
examples: Instead of: 'Premium silk construction' → 'Luxe silk that moves with you'
Instead of: 'Dry clean recommended' → 'Keep it beautiful with dry cleaning'
Instead of: 'Standard delivery' → 'To your door in 5-7 days'
